game.name: All Hail the Orb
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: All Hail The Orb is a quirky and short active incremental game in which you devote yourself to The Orb! Explore the once lost dungeon as you build your gathering of cultists and bring the dungeon back to its former glory! Explore and enjoy the light-hearted progression and story!
game.shortDescriptionEn: All Hail The Orb is a quirky and short active incremental game in which you devote yourself to The Orb! Explore the once lost dungeon as you build your gathering of cultists and bring the dungeon back to its former glory! Explore and enjoy the light-hearted progression and story!
